name: HuStream

overview:
HuStreamâ€™s 1:1 Conversational Video solution combines human psychology, video wizardry and web-based technology to redefine viewer engagement. HuStream enables your website to engage in 1:1 video conversations with your viewer personas, using their language. 1:1 video empowers your viewers to choose their path to relevant information, keeping them engaged.

HuStream creates conversations not commercials.
